description:
At The Fitch Law Firm, we began serving the residents of Columbus and surrounding Central Ohio over 30 years ago. Today, we proudly serve the residents of the entire state from our five office locations. From our Toledo law office, we assist the residents of northwestern Ohio who are victims of negligence or abuse and are suffering due to the following:

  • Personal injuries sustained in motor vehicle and trucking accidents and in traumatic brain injuries (TBI)
  • Injuries resulting from medical malpractice, bad drugs or defective medical devices
  • Sexual abuse

Experienced attorney John Fitch established our firm with the goal of providing cost-effective and efficient legal representation without sacrificing quality. After more than 30 years, it is fair to say Mr. Fitch has realized his goal, making him one of Ohio's most successful personal injury attorneys. In fact, his experience, success and skills at both negotiation and litigation have earned him the respect of not only his clients but also his peers.

If you suffered injuries because of another individual's, business's or professional's negligent or intentional act, you may have the right to pursue compensation for your injuries. At The Fitch Law Firm, we will examine the details of your case and determine the legal approach that fits your needs. If you would like to discuss your situation with our attorney, you can do so by scheduling a free initial consultation at our Toledo law office.
